timeline.bodyText: As discussed. {@link #getReturnType(XExpression, false)} would be my preference.
timeline.author: szarnekow
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ * Returns the actually inferred return type for the given expression or null if none. * Returns the actual expression type, if no explicit return type exists. * - * Shorthand for {{@link #getReturnType(XExpression, false)}} + * Shorthand for getReturnType(XExpression, false)

replies.bodyText:
Which should have read
{@link #getReturnType(XExpression, boolean) getReturnType(expression, false)}
replies.author: szarnekow

timeline.message:
fixed javadoc error (Java 11)

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>

fixed javadoc error (Java 11)
